2Compiling
To compile the example:
Launch EiffelStudio.
Select Use existing Ace (control file) and click OK.
Browse to $ISE_EIFFEL\examples\wel\minimal\.
Choose Ace.ace
Choose the directory where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the Ace file.
Click OK.
2Running After launching the program, a window will be displayed as illustrated above. There is no other functionality, but clicking on the close icon (Cross in top right hand corner), will close the window.
2Under the Hood MINIMAL_DEMO inherits ../../reference/support/WEL_APPLICATION_chart.xmlWEL_APPLICATION and redefines main_window in order to display a ../../reference/windows/WEL_FRAME_WINDOW_chart.xmlWEL_FRAME_WINDOW. This sample contains only one class:
MINIMAL_DEMO
